botan.pubkey.algo.gost_3410

GOST 34.10-2001

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct GOST3410PublicKey;
GOST-34.10 Public Key

this(ref const ECGroup dom_par, ref const PointGFp public_point);
Construct a public key from a given public point.

Params:
ECGroup dom_par the domain parameters associated with this key
PointGFp public_point the public point defining this key

this(in AlgorithmIdentifier alg_id, ref const SecureVector!ubyte key_bits);
Construct from X.509 algorithm id and subject public key bits

struct GOST3410PrivateKey;
GOST-34.10 Private Key

this(RandomNumberGenerator rng, ref const ECGroup domain, BigInt x = 0);
Generate a new private key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator
ECGroup domain parameters to used for this key
BigInt x the private key; if zero, a new random key is generated

class GOST3410SignatureOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Signature;
GOST-34.10 signature operation

class GOST3410VerificationOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Verification;
GOST-34.10 verification operation
